attributes.action: Save the Earth and animals from harmful gases lets introduce Biofuels!
attributes.additional_details: We call upon the goverment to help use save the earth and animals from harm full gases such as carbon dioxide, all these gases are slowley killing the earth and animals this potition is trying to stop these gases in to the air and get a fuel that is less harmful to use and the animals by using biofuels made from products like sugercane, we ask the goverment to increas funding for biofuels to try and save our earth.
